column11: filling each one with positive thoughts and lots of hard work.  I have now gotten to the point where I can now give back and fulfill that promise I made to myself all those years ago.  The initial idea was not clear to me but I knew I wanted to make a difference in some way and as I grew my book business I knew it would be a major part of it.  Only very recently did it occur to me what I wanted to do. Literally within the past few days, I had a fateful interaction with someone I was able to help through my book business, who was currently recovering and looking for help finding a job.  I thought to myself, ""I have a ton of books on interviewing and finding the perfect job"", so I sent this person, who I knew nothing about really, other than their post on a forum, 3 books for free.  He was so grateful and appreciative but the feeling I had was just as profound
column12: it got me thinking.  What if I could provide free books to those currently in alcohol recovery?  Perhaps they love to read but can't afford them, perhaps they dont know how to read and want to learn, perhaps those books will get them through those difficult times like they did for me?  Those in recovery are often depressed, guilt ridden, and feel like the world is against them, but through giving I can offer a small glimmer of hope to those currently suffering.  I am looking to partner with recovery facilities around the country but like anything one has to start small and grow from there, just like I did with the book business.  I will begin with my home state of NJ and expand from there.  I want Wares of The Coast to be apart of a patients entrance into a facility.  Just as they are required to fill out entrance forms, they should also be given the option to select a free book for them to read during their time in treatment.  In order to do this I will need more inventory, more shipping supplies and at some point staff to manage this all.The monetary goal will allow me to purchase more inventory, shipping supplies i.e. mailers, shipping labels  and to allocate a dedicated space to store all the books for this project.  They will need to be segregated from my main inventory and tagged with a barcode so I can locate them without the aid of amazons packing slips.  I plan on sending the treatment facilities a book list which they can give the newcomers, so they can select a book for their stay in treatment.  The books will be given unique seller sku that will also be tagged on the back of the book with a sticky.  This will allow me to locate them in inventory quickly. The cost of monthly storage is about $250 a month for a 10x20 foot space, not including the industrial racks I need to buy that will hold the books. This entire process will also take away from my money producing side of the business which is crucial to keep everything running smoothly.  The donations will pay for the storage fees, and inventory until I can get a steady flow of donations to the project.If you, a friend or a family member has struggled with alcoholism and is now sober or if you know someone close to you who lost their battle with alcohol, you have the opportunity to give back, and help someone who wants to live a fulfilling joyous life. Give them hope through books!   Every little bit helps as well.  When the monetary goal is reached we will begin sourcing the inventory and making arrangements for storage.  In the mean time I will be working through the contact process with the facilities.  I will be updating frequently as things develop and also plan on adding a video  as well as additional monetary perks.  Any contributions prior to the perks being posted will be given  those benefits retroactively.  Website Link:  http://booksforrecovery.org/Here is a link to the Amazon storehttp://amzn.to/1PU1xm6 and  positive feedback ->http://amzn.to/20ER3c1Best Wishes and Thank You!MatthewSome feedback from my Amazon account-""Beyond professional. When there was a problem with a previous order (beyond his control), he offered a generous solution with impeccable manners. We had a series of emails back and forth to work out the details and I was constantly impressed. As a bibliophile I buy a lot of books and he is top notch as a seller. Shipping was fast and the book was very well packaged. A favorite seller!"" on January 8, 2016.""Wonderful experience with this seller. I felt he cared about the books And the customer. The book was exactly as described , reasonably priced and carefully packaged. It was a joy to receive. I especially appreciated the enclosed note. It made the purchase feel warm and personal. Matt responded back promptly to an email inquiry also. I am grateful for this seller on Amazon.""December 9, 2015.""The seller upgraded my order to an original print and copy of the book. I was so excited when I opened up my package to see an original book! He wrote a nice letter and hand signed it. I can definitely tell this seller is sincere and cares about the books he sells. Would definitely order from him again.""October 14, 2015.""This is the second book I purchased from Wares of the Coast and the reason was because my first order exceeded all my expectation from a used book seller and this order was not any different. The book was very well package so it wouldn't be damaged during shipping and the quality of the book was excellent although it was listed as good. Superb seller would definitely recommend.""September 20, 2015.""Always a pleasure to deal with Matt and Wares of the Coast.""on January 2, 2016.""Very enjoyable. Book arrived wrapped for Christmas and with a bonus!""December 18, 2015.""Love my book! Not only that but I was given an extra book as a christmas suprised! The packaging was really cute and the book arrived quickly! I highly recommend this seller!""December 7, 2015.""My book arrived in bomb proof packaging. Obviously great care is taken by this seller both in packaging items and in the description of the book as it was spot on. Thanks a lot!""October 26, 2015.""Perfect in every way
column13: the book was shipped very quickly, was extremely well wrapped and is in wonderful condition-better than expected. Thank you!""October 23, 2015.""The book came in four days and was exactly the way it was described online. ""Please help the needy families here on the Pine Ridge Indian reservation where the parents don't have no jobs or any sort of income. There is 90 percent unemployment on Pine Ridge and we are just trying to make this holiday best for the Lakota people here. I very much appreciate your help. In my heart and through the Great Spirit of God I know that we can reach to reach other people and through your help we can make things better for the children here.  I thank you very much and God bless throughout the world Hoka."" - Jack Redcloud

Help!

We are trying to raise as much as possible to buy gifts for the families on the Pine Ridge Indian Reservation to give their children something this holiday season. 

  • You can either send toys, gifts or food to the address below or donate here. We have created a non-profit 501c3 organization, The Aluna Foundation, to receive donations and will utilize your generous contribution to buy gifts and food for the families on Pine Ridge.
<div>
Extreme Poverty

The poverty on Pine Ridge can be described in no other terms than third world. It is common to find homes overcrowded, as those with homes take in whoever needs a roof over their heads. Many homes are without running water, electricity, or heat.

Pine Ridge Statistics
<ul>
• Unemployment rate of 80-90%
• Per capita income of $4,000
• 8 Times the United States rate of diabetes
• 5 Times the United States rate of cervical cancer
• Twice the rate of heart disease
• 8 Times the United States rate of Tuberculosis
• Alcoholism rate estimated as high as 80%
• 1 in 4 infants born with fetal alcohol syndrome or effects
• Suicide rate more than twice the national rate
• Teen suicide rate 4 times the national rate
• Infant mortality is three times the national rate
• Life expectancy on Pine Ridge is the lowest in the United States and the 2nd lowest in the Western Hemisphere. Only Haiti has a lower rate.
Thank You!
Your contributions will make a difference. They will make children and their parents happy and proud this holiday season.
We know that this is not a solution to the extreme poverty on Pine Ridge, but we are just doing our best to do what we can to bring some happiness.
Address for Donations:

Pine Ridge Holiday Toy Drive
c/o Jack Red Cloud
PO Box 1803
Pine Ridge, SD 57770
AND PLEASE SHARE THIS PAGE VIA EMAIL, FACEBOOK, PERSONAL MESSAGES AND ANY OTHER WAY YOU THINK WOULD HELP.
Our deepest gratitude!
Mitakuye Oyasin - All My Relations and Wakan Takan Kici Un - May the Great Spirit God Bless you!

OurFriends to “Pay-Ahead”  for a meal or two &amp

column1: style house in Kapa’a into a fully Solar-Powered Community Hub.  We want to focus on building awareness of
Environmentalism, Permaculture, &amp
&amp
column2:
Delicious Locally Sourced Food!  Your support will help us install enough Solar Panels to be 100% Solar-Powered. 


But helping us become fully solar powered, we can ensure keeping Kaua'i beautiful, and pay-it-forward by helping the community, and garden isle visitors, have access to great food, and a fun atmosphere.   You will also help us achieve our mission of giving back to those who need or deserve recognition.

*** We also have non-meal retribution based donation options.

column1: Our
mission is to reengineer how restaurant daily operations can be made environmentally
friendly by adopting clean energy technology, minimizing waste, and reducing carbon footprint.  We aim to do
this by always choosing Local ingredients first.
-Locally grown food is fresher and more nutritious, requires far less
fossil fuel, reduces packaging waste, and most of all it supports our Local
Farmers.
-We are even planting our own half-acre veggie garden here alongside
our tropical juice orchard.
-The restaurant will be installing high efficiency appliances and
lighting systems, which both run on clean energy collected from the Sun!
-We are building a Hub for the community to host public events ranging
from live music, game nights, guest speakers, and daytime activities for the
Keiki.
- OurPlace wants to start an on-going conversation with the community
about Permaculture and Earth Friendly Lifestyles through building classroom
gardens, a rainwater harvester, and other renewable energy systems.

A
Cleveland Institution:
For
nearly two years PrestoFresh Grocery, a web-based grocery delivery service, has
provided working professionals, mothers, elderly &amp
disabled an easy, quick, and fresh approach to groceries.
<ul>
<li>In Cleveland we partnered with Zagara's Marketplace, a
family and locally-owned grocery store, to provide a full product line to
our customers.
<li>We partnered with businesses and apartment complexes to
provide perks for their employees and residents respectively.
• We make it easier for everyone to access the highest quality products.
Expanding
and Growing, Keeping our Values
<ul>
• As we grow, more robust technology and processes are needed to ensure that we can continue to maintain the highest quality of product and service.
• Capital will be utilized to enhance these systems and establish new grocer partner relationships across Ohio.
<li>Our model differs drastically from our competitors in
that we have a 360-degree relationship with our customers, grocery stores,
and community.
• Funds will go directly to equipment, technology, start-up labor in our new partner stores, and improved quality control.
The
Mission
<ul>
<li>Allow communities and local grocery stores to
personally join the online grocery revolution.
<li>Provide healthy, fresh groceries to our customers
through honest, viable partnerships.
<li>We are our customers, communities, and clients, not
just a web site.
Risks
&amp
<ul>
• To reduce schedule and cost risks, we have developed a plan with incremental milestones to ensure progress.
• We also have new grocer partners ready to begin service within 4-6 weeks, provided that these partners do not decide to delay due to other priorities.

What's an Animo?
<div>
Animo Verb, Latin, Pronounced ah-ni-moh - I inspire/animate
<div>
<span style=""background-color: initial
column2: >We believe that the main focus of business should extend beyond mere profit.  There are millions of responsible brands and retailers across the globe and in your own backyard that you never knew did so many great things.  From lowering their environmental impact, to providing exceptional benefits, wages and perks, to volunteering and donating significant portions of their time and profits, these good businesses deserve our support.

column1: <div>
<span style=""background-color: initial
column2: >When we decide to Purchase with Purpose, we can be sure that our everyday purchases will help bring about social and environmental change, and will play a part in reshaping how business in done for the better.

column1: <div><span style=""background-color: initial
The Animo Platform
<div>

column5: >Think of Animo as a Yelp for responsible businesses, but instead of rating food and atmosphere, we look at how businesses treat their employees, the community and environment.  We also decided to take things a step further.  With Animo, we want customers to be able to engage with businesses on a deeper level by actually seeing how these businesses are helping our world.

>Story telling through video, pictures, and written pieces will play a big role in every user's experience.  We believe that knowing why a business does the good things it does is just as important as the what and how.

>Social media integration will also give businesses the opportunity to post relevant content on their profiles that users can like, follow, and share just like many other popular social media platforms.

column1: <div>

column5: >Lastly, Animo is completely focused on featuring the positive things in life.  There's seldom a moment that goes by where you don't run into some sort of negative or depressing story.  We understand that bad things happen, but would rather highlight the good things in an attempt to inspire others to take action and do good themselves.  Animo literally means ""I inspire.""  Let's inspire positive change together!

column1: How We Got Here

Several years ago, my wife and I made a commitment to purchase from businesses that supported a cause, were sustainable, or helped an underserved population.  We realized that with the exception of your really popular cause based brands like TOMS shoes, Warby Parker eyewear, and Full Circle Exchange, it was difficult and sometimes time consuming to identify what other businesses were out there doing good things.

column5: >After a great deal of research we realized that there wasn't a consumer centric platform that allowed potential customers to easily identify and locate good businesses locally and nationally.  Thats when we decided to make one.
line-height: 30px

column1: Hi I'm Chuck.  My wife Stefani and I founded Animo to try to better our world.  We love life and deeply care about and want to help others.  We want to build a company that gives women, men, and people of various ethnic backgrounds the opportunity to earn good wages and benefits, have time to enjoy their families, and are encouraged to volunteer and make the world a better place.  If you have questions about Animo or want to chat, feel free to contact us personally at iamanimoinfo@gmail.com.
<div>

column5: line-height: 30px

column1: <h3><span style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
column5: line-height: 26px
column8: >Building a cool and engaging marketplace that connects responsible businesses with users is an exhilarating and expensive task.  From the get-go Animo has been self-funded, but now we are raising $12,000.00 for the following

column1: • Develop and launch features that give users a more engaging experience.
• Begin development of the Animo mobile application for Android and IOS devices.
• Perk Fulfillment

column4: >We are super excited about our perks.  They range from a gesture of our eternal gratitude by putting donors names on the Animo site forever, to handcrafted eco-friendly Animo bracelets, to written thanks inside inspirational books, to experiences involving our exclusive launch party and tickets to one of the coolest Indy rockfests around,
column5: line-height: 26px

column1: If we don't reach our funding goal, what financial support we do receive will go towards creating additional features on the Animo site.
column5: letter-spacing: 0px
column8:
>Why Animo Matters

We are passionate about Animo and creating positive change in the world.  There are millions of businesses in the US and countless more globally that are just as concerned with supporting social and environmental issues as they are with making a profit.  Most people, however, are unable to name more than a handful of these organizations.  Much of this has to do with three things

column1: <ol>
• Many companies don't talk about the great things they do.
• When companies do talk about how they support social and environmental issues on their websites, it can be hard to find.
• Currently, there isn't a service that allows people to quickly and conveniently find these types of businesses.

If you knew there was a grocery store, coffee shop, bank or restaurant that cared about their employees, the community and environment would you shop there?  Nine out of ten Millennials say they would.  Now with Animo you and everyone else can find those great businesses both locally and nationally.


You can change the world just by spending your hard-earned dollars at businesses that care.
<span style=""background-color: initial
column2: >When you make purchases from responsible businesses, they are able to devote more time, money, and resources to schools, the environment, the community, and the welfare of their employees.  When you purchase from businesses that aren't responsible, the likelihood that a portion of the money you spent gets used to create meaningful social and environmental change decreases significantly.

column5: ><h3 style=""text-align: center
column6: >Animo helps you find responsible businesses, putting the power to create meaningful social and environmental change back in you hands
column8: >Its your dollar, your choice, your change!

column1: <h3>Risks &amp

There are always inherent risks and challenges when starting a new business, but Animo isn't some half-baked idea.  Since Animo was founded in July of 2015, dozens of businesses in several US cities have signed up for the platform before it was launched.  There is an ever increasing base of users that have shown their interest, and multiple partnerships have been made with Corporate Social Responsibility news sites and other organizations with similar interests.  The Animo team is comprised of a fabulous and passionate web-designers, marketers, and visionaries, who are supported by advisors with backgrounds in technology, IP law, and sustainability.  Because of this, Animo has the potential to be a global success.

column5: line-height: 30px

column1: If you are unable to monetarily support Animo, we could still use your help in other ways.
<ol>
• Spread the word to your friends, family, and around your community.
• Utilize the tools that Indiegogo provides for this purpose.
• Visit our site www.iamanimo.com and sign up for news, inspiring stories, and early access to future mobile applications.

column2: >From the bottom of our hearts, all of us at Animo thank you for your support!","What's an Animo?

column1: Animo Verb, Latin, Pronounced ah-ni-moh - I inspire/animate

We believe that the main focus of business should extend beyond mere profit.  There are millions of responsible brands and retailers across the globe and in your own backyard that you never knew did so many great things.  From lowering their environmental impact, to providing exceptional benefits, wages and perks, to volunteering and donating significant portions of their time and profits, these good businesses deserve our support.

When we decide to Purchase with Purpose, we can be sure that our everyday purchases will help bring about social and environmental change, and will play a part in reshaping how business in done for the better.
The Animo Platform

Think of Animo as a Yelp for responsible businesses, but instead of rating food and atmosphere, we look at how businesses treat their employees, the community and environment.  We also decided to take things a step further.  With Animo, we want customers to be able to engage with businesses on a deeper level by actually seeing how these businesses are helping our world.

Story telling through video, pictures, and written pieces will play a big role in every user's experience.  We believe that knowing why a business does the good things it does is just as important as the what and how.

Social media integration will also give businesses the opportunity to post relevant content on their profiles that users can like, follow, and share just like many other popular social media platforms.

Lastly, Animo is completely focused on featuring the positive things in life.  There's seldom a moment that goes by where you don't run into some sort of negative or depressing story.  We understand that bad things happen, but would rather highlight the good things in an attempt to inspire others to take action and do good themselves.  Animo literally means ""I inspire.""  Let's inspire positive change together!
How We Got Here

Several years ago, my wife and I made a commitment to purchase from businesses that supported a cause, were sustainable, or helped an underserved population.  We realized that with the exception of your really popular cause based brands like TOMS shoes, Warby Parker eyewear, and Full Circle Exchange, it was difficult and sometimes time consuming to identify what other businesses were out there doing good things.

After a great deal of research we realized that there wasn't a consumer centric platform that allowed potential customers to easily identify and locate good businesses locally and nationally.  Thats when we decided to make one.
A Little About the Founders

Hi I'm Chuck.  My wife Stefani and I founded Animo to try to better our world.  We love life and deeply care about and want to help others.  We want to build a company that gives women, men, and people of various ethnic backgrounds the opportunity to earn good wages and benefits, have time to enjoy their families, and are encouraged to volunteer and make the world a better place.  If you have questions about Animo or want to chat, feel free to contact us personally at iamanimoinfo@gmail.com.
Funding Needs and the Perks

Building a cool and engaging marketplace that connects responsible businesses with users is an exhilarating and expensive task.  From the get-go Animo has been self-funded, but now we are raising $12,000.00 for the following
Develop and launch features that give users a more engaging experience.
Begin development of the Animo mobile application for Android and IOS devices.
Perk Fulfillment

We are super excited about our perks.  They range from a gesture of our eternal gratitude by putting donors names on the Animo site forever, to handcrafted eco-friendly Animo bracelets, to written thanks inside inspirational books, to experiences involving our exclusive launch party and tickets to one of the coolest Indy rockfests around, Treefort.

If we don't reach our funding goal, what financial support we do receive will go towards creating additional features on the Animo site.Why Animo Matters We are passionate about Animo and creating positive change in the world.  There are millions of businesses in the US and countless more globally that are just as concerned with supporting social and environmental issues as they are with making a profit.  Most people, however, are unable to name more than a handful of these organizations.  Much of this has to do with three things
Many companies don't talk about the great things they do.
When companies do talk about how they support social and environmental issues on their websites, it can be hard to find.
Currently, there isn't a service that allows people to quickly and conveniently find these types of businesses.

If you knew there was a grocery store, coffee shop, bank or restaurant that cared about their employees, the community and environment would you shop there?  Nine out of ten Millennials say they would.  Now with Animo you and everyone else can find those great businesses both locally and nationally. You can change the world just by spending your hard-earned dollars at businesses that care.

When you make purchases from responsible businesses, they are able to devote more time, money, and resources to schools, the environment, the community, and the welfare of their employees.  When you purchase from businesses that aren't responsible, the likelihood that a portion of the money you spent gets used to create meaningful social and environmental change decreases significantly.
Animo helps you find responsible businesses, putting the power to create meaningful social and environmental change back in you handsIts your dollar, your choice, your change!
Risks & Challenges

There are always inherent risks and challenges when starting a new business, but Animo isn't some half-baked idea.  Since Animo was founded in July of 2015, dozens of businesses in several US cities have signed up for the platform before it was launched.  There is an ever increasing base of users that have shown their interest, and multiple partnerships have been made with Corporate Social Responsibility news sites and other organizations with similar interests.  The Animo team is comprised of a fabulous and passionate web-designers, marketers, and visionaries, who are supported by advisors with backgrounds in technology, IP law, and sustainability.  Because of this, Animo has the potential to be a global success.
Other Ways to Help
If you are unable to monetarily support Animo, we could still use your help in other ways.
Spread the word to your friends, family, and around your community.
Utilize the tools that Indiegogo provides for this purpose.
Visit our site www.iamanimo.com and sign up for news, inspiring stories, and early access to future mobile applications.
From the bottom of our hearts, all of us at Animo thank you for your support!",3.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Boise, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/i-am-animo/pica

Zing Airlines is the bold idea of connecting Canada in a point-to-point fashion with the small and nimble Bombardier CSeries.
Problem

Until recently, flying small numbers of people (100±20) over long distances was an uneconomical proposition. Smaller planes either lacked the range or comfort while larger planes were simply too large or heavy for the mission. 

Canada is an extremely challenging market defined by small population centres separated by vast distances. As a result, travellers between secondary cities within Canada currently face multiple connecting flights and long travel times.
Long travel times have kept many Canadian cities and families isolated and separated from each other for far too long and this issue needed to be fixed.
<div>

Solution

What is needed is a small and nimble plane capable of travelling vast distances economically and comfortably, that plane is the Canadian built Bombardier CS100.

The CS100 flies further than any regional jet while operating profitably on routes that Boeing and Airbus aircraft are simply too heavy or large for the mission.
Opening up new routes will significantly slashing travel times across Canada.
<div>For an example, Click <a href=""https://www.google.ca/flights/#search
column6: q=moncton+vancouver+flights"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">here to see how painful it is currently.

column1: The short runway requirements of the CS100 enables long distance flights from airports that previously only handled turboprop aircraft thus connecting communities whose citizens have become accustomed to long drives to larger hubs.
<div>

The CS100 has the potential to open up new routes, increase frequencies and also turn seasonal flights into all year long flights.  

Both major Canadian airlines have invested in foreign made planes that fulfil an outdated vision. One can conclude that it is easier for them to keep the status quo going than to radically change their operations. 

The entire Aviation industry is moving towards a point to point system of travel with smaller planes*. The failure of the major airlines in Canada to adapt realized the need for Zing Airlines.  *[1][2][3]
<div>

How we will get there

While creating an airline seems like a monumental task, industry experts have assisted us in establishing a pathway to success: 

Step 1: March – Oct 2015 :

Reach out to Aircraft manufacturers, develop idea and business plan, study aircraft performance and growth plans of competition. 

Step 2: Oct – Dec 2015:

Raise funds necessary for further business development and garner nation wide attention and support. 

Step 3: Dec – Feb 2016:

Business development and finalization of the business plan with 2nd and final round of funding. Acquire all necessary approvals and finalize deal with Bombardier and/or 3rd party lessors. 

Step 4:

Aim for Q2 2017 launch.

The future of domestic aviation in Canada

One day in the near future, Canadians will be boarding comfortable CSeries aircraft at their local airports for direct flights across the nation.
We will look back on 2015 and wonder how anyone put up with the current set up of domestic travel.
<div>
<div>

Threats and Challenges:

We forecast a major upset of the current system as major airlines respond with force to crush this idea but ultimately fail to combat the CSeries with their fleet of misfit planes and band aid solutions.
At a minimum this venture will force the industry to adopt a more point-to-point system of travel realizing the vision of Zing Airlines’ founders.
<div>
At its maximum, we envision dethroning WestJet as Canada’s #2 carrier
column2: it is our opinion that their fleet is a mismatch for the skies of Canada given the advent of the CSeries. Their over dependence on the foreign made 737 was their greatest strength and we intend on making it their greatest weakness.

column1: FAQ
<div>
Why social media and crowd funding?
Social media educates the public on what is possible. It highlights an
issue and solution that many Canadians have faced and had trouble articulating.
An educated public will be able to support this venture via crowd
funding.
An educated public will never be satisfied with the current set up of air travel now that they know what is possible.
By having this idea go viral, we will get the attention of
politicians, potential investors and other key players necessary to make this
happen.
Successful crowd funding here is a vote for connecting Canadian communities, protecting Canadian jobs and reuniting friends and families.
What will the funds be used for?
Funds raised here will be used to pay for the initial and
non-recurring cost of setting up an airline. The costs are mainly business
development and passing all legal requirements and certification.
Once this milestone are accomplished, Zing Airlines will be in a
position to raise funds on the capital market for our 2<sup>nd</sup> and last
round of funding. This final round of funding shall give us the means to start
our airline by the 2nd quarter of 2017.
What if your goal is not reached?

The idea of Zing Airlines challenges the sheer amount of time it takes to travel within Canada. In the unlikely event that our goals are not reached, the funds raised will be used to pressure the Federal government on its stance on Airports to tackle the high costs associated with air travel.

Canadian airports are treated as toll booths instead of economic growth engines, a short sighted stance that has resulted in Canadians priced out of domestic travel unlike Europeans, Americans and far east Asia that recognizes the benefits of affordable aviation.

The funds will be invested in social media initiatives that educate Canadians on how tourism, industry and every facet of our economy will benefit from affordable aviation. We aim to spread awareness and use the frustration we create to force Ottawa to change its attitude towards airports.
We believe that a Canada where middle class families can afford to travel within Canada is a stronger Canada.
See our open letter to PM Justin Trudeau. (PS Congratulations)
The business plan does not depend on the government changing its stance, however both initiatives succeeding will do a world of good for millions of Canadians.
Why is there only one perk?
<div>

column5: >New perks will be issued during the duration of the campaign.

column1: <div>
Team
Wayne Fernandes, Founder

Wayne Fernandes is a logistics consultant based in Toronto. He received his BASc in Industrial Engineering from the University of Windsor in 2011. He comes from a family heavily employed in aviation and decided to pursue the idea of Zing Airlines after witnessing the inefficiencies of domestic travel within Canada on a near weekly basis.
<ul><li>
Ben de Mendonca, Co-Founder'

A native of Toronto, Ben received his BASc in Industrial Engineering from the University of Windsor and currently works for the Provincial Servives Health Authority in BC. His work with the province has given him a solid understanding of logistics planning for aviation resources and Navigation Canada functions.
Benjamin is a licensed Professional Engineering with Professional Engineers Ontario.
Other team members to be announced after successful funding has been completed.
<div>

Select Quotes:

“We aren’t the same low-cost airline that we were in 1996. Our costs have gone up quite a bit and that happens when an airline matures… So a brand-new ULCC would have costs that would be below us, and we always said that he with the lowest costs wins. But there’s a question of whether or not you need to be the absolute lowest cost or whether you just need to be lower cost than another main competitor of yours, so we’re in a comfortable spot because we’ve got a domestic competitor that’s got costs that are quite a bit higher than ours. Nevertheless, a new ULCC would probably create some havoc.” 

- Gregg Saretksy, WestJet CEO Oct 2nd 2015 Financial Post

""The Zing vision is what Canadians have been waiting for since the earliest days of aviation in Canada. We finally have the right plane to connect our country the way it ought to be connected. It would be a national tragedy to let this chance slip through our hands. I invite the nation to back this project and be part of the most exciting and daring venture in Canadian aviation."" 

-Wayne Fernandes, Founder of Zing Airlines

""It must be considered that there is nothing more difficult to carry out, nor more doubtful of success, nor more dangerous to handle, than to initiate a new order of things. For the reformer has enemies in all those who profit by the old order."" 

 - Machiavelli

City tasting
rooms have emerged in the US and Israel as alternatives to visiting isolated
wineries and vineyards.<span>  While winery
tasting rooms only feature their own wines, city tasting rooms offer
visitors the opportunity to taste different types of wines as well as wines of
different wineries.  Visitors are offered
the choice of quantities of wine, varying from “tasting” amounts to half a
glass to a full glass.  The modern, automated
dispensers add a touch of modernity, enhancing the experience.  Israeli cheese and olive dishes to accompany the
tastings also enhance the experience. Guests are then offered the opportunity to buy
wines they enjoyed, often having them shipped to their homes (everyone like getting
packages in the mail), and to join the tasting room’s wine club.

These funds will provide one third of the cost of starting this wine tasting room.  The money will go towards preparing a space in Jerusalem, furnishing it with beautiful tables, chairs, and counters to provide a comfortable atmosphere, simple kitchen appliances, and inventory.  The wineries will provide funding for the dispensing equipment.

Wine tasting rooms have become very popular around the world.  They give people a chance to taste wines from many different wineries in one place.  Tourists come from all over the world to Jerusalem, sometimes from a cruise for the day or for several days.  They often cannot travel around the country to visit Israel's excellent and exciting but scattered wineries.  The country's kosher wine industry has finally hit the world's notice, but most people have never tried the wines.

The latest research has shown that customers actually choose wine to
buy after having tasted it or having it recommended to them (Thach et
al).  This is very different from the typical wine shop approach and a

lot more fun.  The visit becomes an experience with tastings, expert explanations, learning, and more.  The managing partner, Gedalya Persky, has run wine shops in Israel for a number of years, has given many wine tastings and taught classes, and has friendships with many of the best wineries in Israel.
The challenge is to attract the clients.  The advertising emphasis will be on channel marketing. That is,
rather than simply relying on some mix of advertising and walk-in
traffic, we will work with travel agents to bring groups to the tasting room, as well as worker’s committees for company outings, wine clubs and retirement
homes.  The channels chosen will reflect a mix of non-Israeli and Israel

tourists.

Please help get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.use the Use the Indiegogo share tools!

We all have social media accounts with facebook ,twitter, youtube, tumblr,  instagram and others for our personal and business purposes. The most difficult part of it is getting our profile popular in order to get views , likes and followers . That's how Howdy Pixel Social Media is born .
<div>

Howdy Pixel Social Media will be a pixel advertising website unlike any before it aimed at promoting only social media personal and business profiles .Still good isn't good enough so a great idea will be turned into an even better one in every way to suite everyone no matter what. Social Media users will be able to place their profile advertisements in the form of pixels in blocks of 100 pixels for a set amount of money per pixel usually $1 per pixel.

The website is comprised of a 1000 x 10000 pixel slab, making 10,000,000 total pixels available to be bought. This makes it good for both large company profiles who can afford large amounts of pixels, as well as individuals who can still afford to get their profiles next to big name companies.The advertiser gets to choose the block shape and the location on the screen that the profile advertisement goes.

Below are images of  the the first and only successful pixel website where milliondollarhomepage.com  pixels were sold for $1 per pixels in blocks of 100 pixels.  Howdy will be different because it is aimed only for social media profiles and more advance with more pixels , categories to make viewer find you easily and social sharing.
<div>
Categories

Unlike milliondollarhompage Howdy will have many different categories to help viewers looking for a special niche to find your profile easier. So if your profile is a sports profile viewers go to the sports category to easily find your social profile.
<div>

Short Summary

The Alkebulan Trust was founded in October 2014.

Did you know that on average 5 out of 7 children a day in Africa and in the diaspora go with poor education. This leads into:

  • Poor Self-development
  • Poor contribution to society
  • Poor economy system with the cycle continuing.

To stop this cycle we are rebuilding the infrastructure. Mainly the Education and Healthcare system. We are also aim to build a sustainable energy system so children and adults alike can study properly and use Healthcare facilities correctly.

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

In summary w

column1: <ul>

• Some of this will go towards administration costs, such as phone bills and website maintenance.
  • The majority will go on purchasing products and tools to build the sustainable Energy System.
• We are doing this project one goal at a time. So it is vital that our goal is reached.
If we do not reach this goal, we will keep trying. But the funds that we do manage to raise will be split evenly to keep The Alkebulan Trust running.
What you will get in summary:
<div>
<ul>
• T-shirt with our company logo and website
• Poems based on Africa and the diaspora
We will be working on more perks later. Tell us what you would like in return and we will see if we can make this possible. After we can not achieve this goal without your help.
The Impact

What your contribution means in Summary:
  • In Africa most households use a gas or diesel powered generators. This is very dangerous especially in a very hot climate. Also not many have access or enough money to keep it running to have enough power to do the basics. Meaning most things are done in the light.
  • The impact of having sustainable energy system will be extremely beneficial. Not only would we be able to carry out our Education and Healthcare work but they would be able to do the basic things at night and not have to worry about having enough money. 
  • Your contribution means you will be helping many generations for years to come. 

Risks &
column2:
Challenges

In our first year we have faced many challenges these were:

  • Door to Door fundraising (Not has much donations raised to achieve overall first goal) especially only with two fundraisers.

    ","Short Summary The Alkebulan Trust was founded in October 2014.

Did you know that on average 5 out of 7 children a day in Africa and in the diaspora go with poor education. This leads into:  Poor Self-development Poor contribution to society Poor economy system with the cycle continuing.  To stop this cycle we are rebuilding the infrastructure. Mainly the Education and Healthcare system. We are also aim to build a sustainable energy system so children and adults alike can study properly and use Healthcare facilities correctly.   What We Need & What You Get In summary we need in the region of £1,050.00:
Some of this will go towards administration costs, such as phone bills and website maintenance. The majority will go on purchasing products and tools to build the sustainable Energy System.
We are doing this project one goal at a time. So it is vital that our goal is reached.
If we do not reach this goal, we will keep trying. But the funds that we do manage to raise will be split evenly to keep The Alkebulan Trust running.
What you will get in summary:
T-shirt with our company logo and website
Poems based on Africa and the diaspora
We will be working on more perks later. Tell us what you would like in return and we will see if we can make this possible. After we can not achieve this goal without your help.
The Impact

What your contribution means in Summary:  In Africa most households use a gas or diesel powered generators. This is very dangerous especially in a very hot climate. Also not many have access or enough money to keep it running to have enough power to do the basics. Meaning most things are done in the light. The impact of having sustainable energy system will be extremely beneficial. About Me

I am a social intrapreneur whose made it a point to include empathy and inclusiveness in all the work I do. I'm passionate about social enterprise and help entrepreneurs create strategies that let them give back to the community.

Through the IDEX Global fellowship I will be able to aquire additional skills and knowledg to help me bring about the change I want to see in my community.

About the Fellowship

IDEX is a six-month professional fellowship for individuals seeking to gain emerging market experience while working to support enterprises in India that deliver social change to local and global communities. These enterprise partners serve as placement organisations and mentors for IDEX Global fellows. Fellows work full-time with enterprise partners during their fellowship. The IDEX human capital investment model provides high-impact programming and support for individuals to develop critical skills, gain valuable emerging market experience, access to professional mentoring and launch meaningful social impact careers that have the potential to drive social change. You can read more about the fellowship
column5: >
column8: >

column5: >

column1: My Story

I have taken a very crooked path to get to this fellowship, but I believe every step was worth it. After finishing high school I chose not to go to university and worked retail sales and customer service. While in customer service, I realised my job wasn't fulfilling and decided to study something that would enable me to ""help people"" I chose sociology with the intention of joining the non-profit sector when I graduated. After university, while working various jobs I realised that the non-profit model left a lot to be desired. We were at the mercy of funders and projects that need to happen at times wouldn't, simply because of money. My search for a better solution lead me to social enterprise.
At
my last job, I even did up a proposal for a social enterprise to help women in
Bomba (video here). That project got me into the Project Inspire 2014 grand
finals where I got a chance to meet some awesome change makers and social
entrepreneurs. My project didn't win, but the experience impacted the way I
did  things when I got home and helped me

improve the project plan. Besides the work I've done, I truly believe that social enterprise is the solution to development in emerging markets and see the IDEX Global Fellowship as an opportunity to learn as much as I can. I aim to bring that knowledge back home and share it with as many people will listen (maybe even a few who won't)

How YOU Can Help

I am fortunate and have been given a partial scholarship to cover the tuition portion of my fellowship, but s
column5: >till

column1: have additional costs to cover. That'
column5: >s where YOU come in. I need your help to be able to cater for the items I am personally responsible for funding.The fellowship will provide me with a small stipend, but I am still responsible for the cost of my airfare, visa application, medical aid (health insurance) and living expenses.That's where YOU come in. I need your help to be able to cater for the items I am personally responsible for funding. I will cover the balance of the tuition myself, but need help with the remaining costs.

column1: IDEX is an opportunity for me to do on the ground work with organisations and people who embody the values I strive to live on a daily basis. Nothing would mean more to me than to know that you, the people I love and would love to get to know, support me.

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can give money and some of you have resources that will be just as valuable to me. So if you can, do the following:

  • Make Some Noise- share my campaign with your contacts, in person, by email and on social media. The more people hear, the more help I'll get. You can use the Indiegogo share tools and make it easy.
  • Introduce me to some one in India, I don't know my placement city yet, but it's always nice to know someone where you're going.

THANK YOU!!!

Video Sales Work!
Your chance to utilize one of the newest marketing trends at a heavily discounted price.

YouTube Video marketing is the new wave of internet marketing. The New York Times recently reported that even major toy makers and toy sellers are making a bigger effort to promote their wares through YouTube videos.

Until now finding a video creation specialist that can make a nice customized video for your business was often an expensive proposition. And then you needed to find a SEO (Search Engine Optimization) specialist to get your video found by your potential customers.

We don't just make you a nice video, customized for your business, we install it for you in your own YouTube channel. Then we optimize both on page and off page search engine optimization so your new video is found by your new potential customers, often on the top of the first page of Google search. Check out our testimonial page as we rank videos for small businesses across the country.

You can also share your video on social media and embed it on your website if you have one. If you do not have a website, we can use YouTube annotations to send your customers to your phone by clicking on the video.

At the bottom of this page find your business type and click on the button to see a sample video that we would customize for you. If your business is not there, email or call me and maybe we have a video for your business we have not yet listed.
Check out the screen shots at the bottom of the gallery page. How much more business would you get with a video that ranks at the top of google search?
<h3>What We Need &amp
• My team and I are looking for work and to make 100 happy customers.
• (Keeping the staff busy and making a little dough to make sure they get paid is always good.)
• In exchange you will get a really cool spokesperson video customized for your business that is ranked high in Google search for your key word search terms. And for a REALLY LOW PRICE!
Frequently Asked Questions.
Q. Do I need a website to use video marketing?
A. No, you do not need a website. We can use a YouTube annotation and send the viewer directly to your phone number.
Q. Will high ranking YouTube videos help the ranking of my website?
A. We have seen that one high ranking YouTube video will improve the ranking of other videos in the channel, the channel itself and often the linked website.
Q. If I order the website, how do I get a website name (URL) and hosting?
A. I contacted my representative at Godaddy.Com and he said the website name (URL) and hosting would cost about $60. Just call them at: 480-505-8877
Q. I have heard about ""Black Hat"" SEO and I do not want any of that.

A. The vast majority of links built, views made, likes clicked and shares shared are made by real human beings. Nothing ""Black Hat"" involved in humans watching, clicking and sharing. That is also the reason we are a little more expensive for our SEO services.
Q. What if Google changes it's mind and decides to penalize videos optimized the way you do it?

A. Probably will not happen, but if it does, just delete the video from your channel and reload it. The URL will change and any linking, etc. will stay with the old URL and your video is considered ""new"".
Q. When will I get my videos, website and hat delivered and ranked in Google search?

A. We will start on a ""first come, first served"" basis. We have the 100 business categories of spokesperson videos ready and we will make your YouTube channel and put up your spokesperson video right away. We will also be shipping the first hats within two weeks of the first purchases.
Anyone that orders a second video or a website that is not listed in the 20 business we have listed may have a several week delay as we locate or create a template for your business.
Q. What if I want to start with one video and upgrade before the end of the Indiegogo campaign or add additional SEO services?
A. I believe that Indiegogo will allow me to add perks as long as they do not conflict with the existing perks. Email me and I will see if I can add that to this campaign.
Have more questions? email me at doug at pillid dot com or call me at 1-224-856-7764
Why this project and Indiegogo campaign?
The longer version of the story:
As an aside to my website development work I have been
following the phenomenon of video marketing on YouTube for the past
year. I learned how to produce videos and get them to show up in the top
of Google search.
Being totally fascinated by this new trend, I began to attend every
webinar and buy every program I could find about producing and ranking
YouTube videos. For nearly a year I have learned everything I could
learn and bought nearly all the ""stock"" videos I could find. Hundreds of
them!
When I started this project a couple months ago our intention was to
have about 20 different business types available with at least two stock
videos for each. In doing my market research I found many potential
customers that did not fall into the 20 different businesses but most
were in the 100 businesses we had spokesperson videos for.
Consequently our project has suffered from ""mission creep"" and we
have expanded to 100+ business types with at least two videos and a
website template for each. This delayed our launch date by about 45 - 60
days.
We do have over 100 ""spokesperson"" type videos ready to go and could
have one of these videos ranking in Google video or YouTube search for
you in a matter of days after you order it.
Risks, Challenges &
• In my opinion as an ""old guy"" who has been around the block a few times, this is a fairly low risk undertaking and has every potential to satisfy every customer.

• I have been a recruiter and manager all my life, often hiring, training and managing dozens or even hundreds of employees for ""project work"". I am confident I can scale this campaign to whatever the sales are.
• Our greatest challenge could be meeting deadlines if we cannot sell our receivable from Indiegogo/Paypal. (We do have someone tentatively lined up to help with this)
• All and all, I have high expectations for both our crowdfunding campaign and the website.

Other Ways You Can Help

If this offer is not for you or you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:
• If you know someone with a small business that needs more clients, let them know this could be one of the best advertising offers they might find this year.
• Like us and Share us on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn etc.
• Also remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!
• And you could always just buy the Gold Angel Investor hat!
And that is about all. Visit us and watch our progress at the new website Video Sales Work.
Gold Angel Investor Perk: A cool hat . .

","Video Sales Work!
Your chance to utilize one of the newest marketing trends at a heavily discounted price.

YouTube Video marketing is the new wave of internet marketing. The New York Times recently reported that even major toy makers and toy sellers are making a bigger effort to promote their wares through YouTube videos.

Until now finding a video creation specialist that can make a nice customized video for your business was often an expensive proposition. And then you needed to find a SEO (Search Engine Optimization) specialist to get your video found by your potential customers.

We don't just make you a nice video, customized for your business, we install it for you in your own YouTube channel. Then we optimize both on page and off page search engine optimization so your new video is found by your new potential customers, often on the top of the first page of Google search. Check out our testimonial page as we rank videos for small businesses across the country.

You can also share your video on social media and embed it on your website if you have one. If you do not have a website, we can use YouTube annotations to send your customers to your phone by clicking on the video.

At the bottom of this page find your business type and click on the button to see a sample video that we would customize for you. If your business is not there, email or call me and maybe we have a video for your business we have not yet listed.
Check out the screen shots at the bottom of the gallery page. How much more business would you get with a video that ranks at the top of google search?
What We Need & What You Get The short version:
My team and I are looking for work and to make 100 happy customers.
(Keeping the staff busy and making a little dough to make sure they get paid is always good.)
In exchange you will get a really cool spokesperson video customized for your business that is ranked high in Google search  for your key word search terms. And for a REALLY LOW PRICE!
Frequently Asked Questions.
Q. Do I need a website to use video marketing?
A. No, you do not need a website. We can use a YouTube annotation and send the viewer directly to your phone number.
Q. Will high ranking YouTube videos help the ranking of my website?
A. We have seen that one high ranking YouTube video will improve the ranking of other videos in the channel, the channel itself and often the linked website.
Q. If I order the website, how do I get a website name (URL) and hosting?
A. I contacted my representative at Godaddy.Com and he said the website name (URL) and hosting would cost about $60. Just call them at: 480-505-8877
Q. I have heard about ""Black Hat"" SEO and I do not want any of that.

A. The vast majority of links built, views made, likes clicked and shares shared are made by real human beings. Nothing ""Black Hat"" involved in humans watching, clicking and sharing. That is also the reason we are a little more expensive for our SEO services.
Q. What if Google changes it's mind and decides to penalize videos optimized the way you do it?

A. Probably will not happen, but if it does, just delete the video from your channel and reload it. The URL will change and any linking, etc. will stay with the old URL and your video is considered ""new"".
Q. When will I get my videos, website and hat delivered and ranked in Google search?

A. We will start on a ""first come, first served"" basis. We have the 100 business categories of spokesperson videos ready and we will make your YouTube channel and put up your spokesperson video right away. We will also be shipping the first hats within two weeks of the first purchases.
Anyone that orders a second video or a website that is not listed in the 20 business we have listed may have a several week delay as we locate or create a template for your business.
Q. What if I want to start with one video and upgrade before the end of the Indiegogo campaign or add additional SEO services?
A. I believe that Indiegogo will allow me to add perks as long as they do not conflict with the existing perks. Email me and I will see if I can add that to this campaign.
Have more questions? email me at doug at pillid dot com or call me at 1-224-856-7764
Why this project and Indiegogo campaign?
The longer version of the story:
As an aside to my website development work I have been
following the phenomenon of video marketing on YouTube for the past
year. I learned how to produce videos and get them to show up in the top
of Google search.
Being totally fascinated by this new trend, I began to attend every
webinar and buy every program I could find about producing and ranking
YouTube videos. For nearly a year I have learned everything I could
learn and bought nearly all the ""stock"" videos I could find. Hundreds of
them!
When I started this project a couple months ago our intention was to
have about 20 different business types available with at least two stock
videos for each. In doing my market research I found many potential
customers that did not fall into the 20 different businesses but most
were in the 100 businesses we had spokesperson videos for.
Consequently our project has suffered from ""mission creep"" and we
have expanded to 100+ business types with at least two videos and a
website template for each. This delayed our launch date by about 45 - 60
days.
We do have over 100 ""spokesperson"" type videos ready to go and could
have one of these videos ranking in Google video or YouTube search for
you in a matter of days after you order it.
Risks, Challenges & Solutions
In my opinion as an ""old guy"" who has been around the block a few times, this is a fairly low risk undertaking and has every potential to satisfy every customer.

I have been a recruiter and manager all my life, often hiring, training and managing dozens or even hundreds of employees for ""project work"". I am confident I can scale this campaign to whatever the sales are.
Our greatest challenge could be meeting deadlines if we cannot sell our receivable from Indiegogo/Paypal. (We do have someone tentatively lined up to help with this)
All and all, I have high expectations for both our crowdfunding campaign and the website.
Other Ways You Can Help If this offer is not for you or you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:
If you know someone with a small business that needs more clients, let them know this could be one of the best advertising offers they might find this year.
Like us and Share us on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn etc.
Also remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!
And you could always just buy the Gold Angel Investor hat!
And that is about all. Visit us and watch our progress at the new website Video Sales Work.
Gold Angel Investor Perk: A cool hat . . Samples of our own and our customer's videos.
Video Sales Work Sales Video

Hi. My name is April Trueblood. I’m an artist, musician, and gallery owner living on Hatteras Island, just off the coast of North Carolina. I own a little shop called The Swell Art Gallery. 

In 2014, I purchased a gallery called Indian Town Gallery from my then boss who wished to move away. By the end of 2017, I had to accept that this business could barely afford its own rent, but absolutely would never be able to pay me a salary. Some of our vendors often (and very kindly) waited longer than normal for us to get their invoices paid as well. So, it became apparent that we needed to close up shop or find a more affordable spot.

Fortune smiled upon us and the perfect place fell into our laps. A space with a lease that will cost half as much as our original location and in a bustling part of Buxton - home of the Cape Hatteras Lighthouse - became available. We committed to rent it immediately. However, after years of sitting empty, it would need some work. The new owner of that space, a commercial contractor from Pennsylvania, agreed to do the work to get us in there.

Below is the old Falcon Motel - the place we've had our hearts set on. These are a couple of photos of it in two of its earlier incarnations. 

I love this place. It’s one of those retro roadside motel kind of buildings. Built in 1962 by the Jennette family, it’s a landmark cherished by many local residents as well as the thousands of guests who have stayed there over the years.

The Falcon fell into disrepair, was partially gutted, and had been foreclosed upon. Once the foreclosing bank put the property on the market, one offer came from a development company who planned to tear it down and build condos. For that reason, the bank chose instead to sell it to the current owners who proposed restoring/renovating it, citing that it would be better for the community to preserve it. The front block of motel rooms closest to Highway 12 is the building that had been gutted. The owner decided it would make a nice retail space, so that’s the part of the motel we've worked hard to occupy.

Along with the family who now owns it, I'm thrilled about the prospect of breathing new life into this wonderful property. The location is so great. It’s right in the busiest part of Buxton, just north of the Cape Hatteras lighthouse. Our original location was farther south and on a path less traveled. Between the busier location and the cutting in half of the rent, it seems apparent that if a quirky little art shop can survive anywhere on this island, this must be the place.

Above: Negan from The Walking Dead (Jeffrey Dean Morgan) stops by to shop from time to time. He's just a regular person. Who would've guessed?

In early 2018, we moved out of our original home and waited for the renovations to commence. However, between missteps and issues with the county government and COVID-19, the owner wasn’t able to get the work done. We waited. And waited. And waited. During that time, we rebranded. We were no longer in the Indiantown Shores area of Frisco, so the old name had to go. We became The Swell Art Gallery.

By mid-2020, it was obvious that if we were ever to move into the Falcon, I’d have to hire a contractor. 

With the offer of a loan from a family friend in my pocket, Ty Vayette and Tom Hardee of SeaQuest Construction looked at the project with a sympathetic eye. Having known me for many years, Mr. Vayette decided to trust that if SeaQuest did the work, I would figure out how to pay them. 

Three years later, the work is complete and the loan never materialized. In addition to the usual way that construction projects go over budget, the pandemic-related significant rise in costs of materials in 2020 caused the price tag of the project to soar. I’ve been making little payments along the way from a small EIDL loan I'd taken out in early 2020, plus small loans from my family. But I’m very far behind and it’s well past time for me to pay off the contractor. This is where I could really use some help.

If you came to one of our craft shows, painted a TINY canvas or used our scholarship for school, enjoyed a gallery event, found the perfect gift at the shop, saw something that made you laugh or think or consider taking up art yourself, would you consider helping us out with this if you can?

We’ve been working on a cool perks package that has offerings from some of our artists and other local businesses as well. Take a look! There are lots of fun perks up for grabs!

We support a number of local artists, potters, jewelry makers, and photographers in our gallery and seek out handmade arts and crafts from American artists as much as possible. We love being part of the Outer Banks' rich and dedicated creative community, a local home for Hatteras Island’s artistic talent, and a place where visitors and local residents alike can can be inspired by the fine art, clever design, and sweet gifts that we have to offer. Your support will help us to finally get our footing in a location where we can thrive, and keep us around longer to establish more scholarships (so far we’ve got one!), re-instate our feral kitten adoption program (yes - we used to find homes for feral kittens until we gave a permanent home to two rescues) and continue our involvement in community arts programs that bring people together.

In this gallery, I’ve finally found something to do with my life that has given me fulfillment. I’ve seriously never had that before. Building this joyful, creative, innovative yet nostalgic space is the most satisfying thing I've ever done. For almost 7 years now, I’ve been wholly engaged with this project and taken every opportunity to learn how to be a better artist, business person, and community member. And I'm just getting started.

We are grateful for anything we get. And we don't expect that everyone who would like to chip in to this campaign has the funds to do so. Please don't stress about that! You can help us out by sharing this on your social media or by telling any of your friends who may be interested in this project about it. You can also stop by and see the new place when you're next in town. And if you're fans of Sam and Honeybun, our shop cats, please come by and give them some love. They spent all of 2020 and the spring of 2021 living in the studio behind the house for the last year and haven't been able to see many people. And you know how social these cats are. :)

THE PERKS
Please click here to read more about our perks. There are lots of details for each perk that don't fit into the allowed space in the listings.

Thanks again!

Your support will help us to finally get our footing in a location where we can thrive, and keep us around longer to establish more scholarships (so far we’ve got one!), re-instate our feral kitten adoption program (yes - we used to find homes for feral kittens until we gave a permanent home to two rescues) and continue our involvement in community arts programs that bring people together.In this gallery, I’ve finally found something to do with my life that has given me fulfillment. I’ve seriously never had that before. Building this joyful, creative, innovative yet nostalgic space is the most satisfying thing I've ever done. For almost 7 years now, I’ve been wholly engaged with this project and taken every opportunity to learn how to be a better artist, business person, and community member. And I'm just getting started.We are grateful for anything we get. And we don't expect that everyone who would like to chip in to this campaign has the funds to do so. Please don't stress about that! You can help us out by sharing this on your social media or by telling any of your friends who may be interested in this project about it. You can also stop by and see the new place when you're next in town. And if you're fans of Sam and Honeybun, our shop cats, please come by and give them some love. They spent all of 2020 and the spring of 2021 living in the studio behind the house for the last year and haven't been able to see many people. And you know how social these cats are. :)THE PERKSPlease click here to read more about our perks. There are lots of details for each perk that don't fit into the allowed space in the listings.Thanks again!",11.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Buxton, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/help-swell-art-gallery-with-reopening-costs/pica

Oh hello again

Lion's Tooth is a start-up bookstore café specializing in small press books and graphic novels. We had plans to open in the summer and even launched an Indiegogo campaign before the coronavirus hit. It's been a long, sad, stupefying year since, but we fought hard to keep our dream alive.
In 2020 we focused on our book and graphic novel subscriptions, which have allowed us to promote indie artists, stay active in the community and survive as a business, against all odds.
Then guess what? WE FOUND A HOME!!
Welcome to our brick-and-mortar location at 2421 S Kinnickinnic Ave in beautiful Bay View!
Yes, we are *almost* ready for our grand opening, or rather a ""tiny, soft, pop-up opening period"", as we wait for Armageddon to be over to become the social space we're meant to be.

This is a huge step and we really need your support to get through the pandemic months ahead. Until it is safe the store will be open only for no contact pick up and limited appointments and browsing.

And when the end of the world is over we will have a bookstore café with a busy event calendar including story time, book clubs, art exhibits and music shows. Lion's Tooth will be a magical space for people of all ages. Please help us make it to the other side ❤️
<h3 style=""text-align: center
How you can help
<ul>
• Consider making a cash contribution to this campaign to help us achieve our goal
• Get a book or graphic novel subscription for yourself or as a gift
• Shop our online store and sign up for our newsletter on our website
• Like us on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and subscribe to our YouTube channel
• Vote for us as Best Comic Book Store on the Shepherd Express 2020 Best of Milwaukee
• Spread the love like dandelions to the wind!
The ladies behind Lion's Tooth
Lion's Tooth is a partnership between Shelly McClone-Carriere and Cris Siqueira.
<ul>

• Shelly McClone-Carriere is one of the founders of the Riverwest Co-op. She was a board member from 2002-2012, manager from 2001-2018 and bookkeeper since 2003. She is currently the School Café coordinator at Highland Community School, working with middle schoolers to develop skills that include planning the menu, budgeting and preparing meals for students, teachers and family members. Shelly's passion for books and community is at the heart of what Lion's Tooth stands for.

• Cris Siqueira is a Brazilian-born American citizen living in Milwaukee since 2004. She owned a bookstore  specialized in ""comics as art"" in São Paulo, and has translated over ten graphic novels to Portuguese. In 1997, Cris interviewed some of the best American cartoonists, like the Hernandez brothers, Daniel Clowes, Chris Ware and Dame Darcy, and published an award-winning compilation that introduced their work to Brazilian readers. For the last couple of years she has been revisiting these conversations with articles in the Milwaukee Record and in Lion's Tooth website.

column2: >Thank you for supporting Milwaukee's newest bookstore!

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div>
Embarquez dans l'aventure Idle Garage

Le concept de garage moto et d’atelier DIY n’est pas nouveau, mais c’est en parlant de l’idée entre amis et suite à notre étude de marché que nous nous sommes rendu compte qu’on était nombreux et nombreuses à avoir besoin d’un espace complet pour des projets moto.

Un endroit où il est possible d’avoir accès à des outils spécialisés, de faire des formations, de rencontrer d’autres passionnés. Notre rêve, c’est de rendre accessible la moto dans un environnement sécuritaire et propice à l'apprentissage.

Le Idle c’est aussi un garage de réparation complet pour toutes vos réparations courantes mais aussi pour vos build customs. Nous vous offrons un accès privilégié au behind the scene pour tisser un lien de confiance entre vous et notre équipe mécanique.
En plus du garage et des espaces DIY on construit un café pour accueillir les gens du quartier dans une ambiance simple et relax avec une super terrasse.
Le Idle Garage &
column2: Co est un espace inclusif et ouvert à tous sans aucune discrimination. Pour tous les amoureux d’huile à moteur, de road trips, d’aventures, de trucs faits à la main, de bons vibes et de projets fous! Le monde de la moto est en évolution constante, embarquez avec nous pour faire partie du premier concept unique au Québec!

column1: Vous pouvez suivre l'évolution du projet ici.
L'équipe

Mikey Rose, copropriétaire du Savvy Barbershop et gestionnaire aux opérations. Il vient rejoindre le même rôle qu'il occupe au Savyy. Il est aussi grandement impliqué dans la communauté motocycliste de Montréal.

David Lechasseur, copropriétaire du Savvy Barbershop, directeur du marketing et partenariat. Il vient aussi retrouver le même rôle qu’il occupe déjà au Savvy. En résumé, deux gars qui savent comment faire rouler (oh le jeu de mots) une entreprise avec succès.

Charle-Élie Dumontier: propriétaire accompli du garage Sheriff à Bolton Est, il rejoint le projet comme directeur mécanique et amène sa grande expertise en maintenance, réparation et modification customs. Un de ses premier build fut figuré sur un des sites motos les plus consultés en Amérique du Nord. Il offrira aussi des formations mensuelles et des accompagnements privés pour démocratiser la mécanique moto.

Raphaël Gaspard: entrepreneur en série et membre de la cohorte 2015 de l’émission Dans l’Oeil du Dragon ou il a reçu les éloges unanimes des juges, il apporte son expertise en technologie et en restauration. Il occupe le rôle de gestionnaire aux opérations et sera aussi responsable du comptoir café et des stations DIY.
La campagne

C'est important pour nous d'inclure le plus de monde possible dans cette aventure parce qu'on la construit aussi pour vous. Vos contributions vont avoir un impact direct sur notre projet et l'amour qu'on partage tous pour la moto et sa communauté. C'est avec beaucoup d'émotions qu'on imagine déjà vous voir débarquer au Idle et profiter des stations, des outils spécialisés, de notre équipe mécanique, de notre café et d'un accueil chaleureux de notre staff.
Notre objectif

On vise 25,000$. Avec votre aide, on va pouvoir améliorer notre site web pour faciliter les réservations et offrir aux membres des formations mécaniques, mieux équiper le coin DIY et upgrader nos outils spécialisés qui seront offerts en libre-service.
Le concept DIY

Nos stations DIY sont spécialement conçues pour vos projets moto et sont disponibles en location à un tarif horaire abordable et peuvent être réservées à l'avance. Une station comprend un ensemble complet d'outils métriques et impériaux, un lift à moto et suffisamment d'espace pour travailler. Nous inclurons même tout le nécessaire, tels que des gants en caoutchouc, des linges de travail, du dégraissant et des produits de nettoyage. Il y aura sur place des outils spécialisés pour changer et balancer vos pneus etc. On proposera aussi des formations mécaniques 101 afin que vous puissiez améliorer vos compétences dans un environnement relax. Les membres auront accès à un tarif réduit sur les location DIY, les formations mensuelles et un tas d’autres avantages.
Challenges

La situation actuelle rend difficile le financement d'un tel projet, mais ça ne nous arrête pas pour autant. On travaille jour et nuit pour rénover le grand local en plein coeur de Villeray sur la rue Jean-Talon, avec notre terrasse, notre parking à moto, et nos deux portes de garages qui donnent sur la rue. Un de nos challenges fut de trouver une compagnie d'assurance pour ce projet ambitieux, et nous avons eu la chance de tomber sur un courtier qui nous a trouvé le partenaire idéal pour le garage, le café et les espaces DIY. On est conscient que nous allons rencontrer plusieurs défis, nous croyons en notre rêve et à voir l'amour qu'on reçoit depuis le début, vous aussi. Avec nos backgrounds et expériences, on forme une équipe soudée et compétentes qui se relève les manches depuis de nombreux mois, pis on fait juste commencer. On est aussi accompagné par une experte en droit des affaires, Sylvie Bougie et une solide équipe de comptables.
On est tout prêt de l'autoroute 40, de la rue Saint-Hubert et du Marché Jean-Talon, accessible à tous. On ouvre le 1er Mai pis on vous veut dans l'aventure!

Il occupe le rôle de gestionnaire aux opérations et sera aussi responsable du comptoir café et des stations DIY.

<h4> <b style=""background-color: initial
column2: >All our pieces are sold individually (view gallery).

column1: Our Story:

The concept of contemporary outdoor furniture was designed by myself, Ed Gollob, a 30-year veteran of the plastics industry. Easy Living LLC is a division of GO Plastics LLC, a manufacturer of rotationally molded polyethylene products since 1986. We built all our furniture sets using the same concept as our outdoor polyethylene free publication racks, advertising benches and waste containers, seen throughout every state in the United States. This process makes Easy Living outdoor furniture stronger and more durable than any other competitors.

After conducting a thorough research of outdoor furniture, we became obsessed with creating the very best in long-lasting outdoor polyethylene furniture in the industry and perhaps worldwide! Why should consumers only have to select from dull, expensive, bulky, hard to assemble outdoor furniture?  Working together with my son, Neal Gollob, who is the General Manager and Head of Product Design, we created the finest outdoor furniture that will allow mix and match options.

To bring this revolutionary new outdoor furniture to the masses and maintain competitive prices, we need  YOUR HELP in raising our minimum goal of $110,000. This will assist toward our tooling costs and marketing budget (press releases, trade show attendance, social media:both organic and paid spends). As a longtime businessman, I will ensure all donations are effectively allocated.
All our products are proudly made in the USA, 100% recyclable and fully guaranteed. As a pioneer in rotational molding, in which the company specializes, the risks are low with our products.
